author: albusdompeldorius
content: Yes, I control the signing system. Do you mean just generating an aggregated BLS-signature of the message signed by a set of public keys outside the prover, and just prove that the signature is a valid signature of the message by the sum of the public keys?

author: sky.cactus
content: That way you only need to validate a single thing inside the circuit, rather than needing to validate multiple.

author: albusdompeldorius
content: Yeah, except adding the public keys of the signers, but that's cheap.

author: albusdompeldorius
content: (The set of signers is not fixed)
